20101208145844.333|20101208145845.444|CCO|     YOUR RISK OF CANCER.
20101208145845.444|20101208145846.556|CCO|   ALWAYS TELL YOUR DOCTOR IF
20101208145846.556|20101208145847.667|CCO|YOU HAVE ANY SIGN OF INFECTION,
20101208145847.667|20101208145848.778|CCO|      OR HAVE HAD CANCER.
20101208145848.778|20101208145849.889|CCO|       ALERT YOUR DOCTOR
20101208145849.889|20101208145851.000|CCO|  OF NEW OR WORSENING PROBLEMS
20101208145851.000|20101208145852.250|CCO| INCLUDING HEADACHES, SEIZURES,
20101208145852.250|20101208145853.500|CCO| CONFUSION AND VISION PROBLEMS.
20101208145853.500|20101208145854.750|CCO|       THESE MAY BE SIGNS
20101208145854.750|20101208145856.000|CCO|           OF A RARE,
20101208145856.000|20101208145857.250|CCO|       POTENTIALLY FATAL
20101208145857.250|20101208145858.500|CCO|       BRAIN CONDITION.
20101208145858.500|20101208145859.750|CCO|   SERIOUS ALLERGIC REACTIONS
20101208145859.750|20101208145901.000|CCO|           CAN OCCUR.

20101208145903.857|20101208145905.286|CCO|    OR HAS RECENTLY RECEIVED
